info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued May 31 at 3:39PM HST until June 02 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR SOUTH FACING SHORES OF ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... .A long period south swell continues to bring solid advisory level surf to all south facing shores. The advisory remains in effect through Wednesday night. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Surf 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...South facing shores of all Hawaiian islands. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
